nodes.text: Merr-Sonn Munitions, Inc.'s PB08 Heavy Blaster Pistol was one of the most sturdy and reliable blaster pistols on the market. It featured a short ventilated barrel and a heat management system. The internal gas was circulated in heat sinks in the barrel, causing a unique energy management that economized the tibanna stores.

The PB08 is mentioned in Fantasy Flight Games' 2018 roleplaying game sourcebook Dawn of Rebellion based on Star Wars Rebels and Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. The book is authored by John Dunn, Tom Sorenson, Sterling Hershey, Jonathan Julius, Keith Ryan Kappel, Tim Huckelberry, Jason Marker, and James M. Spahn.
